metadata.name: Chroma Chums
metadata.description:
The Chroma Chums are a group of wild and wacky cartoon creatures who come together on the neon furniture for the ultimate talk show experience on "Neon Sofa Stories." Each of these energetic and colorful characters has their own distinct personality and style, and they're not afraid to let loose and have some fun.

The Chroma Chums are a tight-knit group of friends who love to share their experiences and have a good time on the talk show. They're always up for a laugh, and they know how to keep the conversation interesting and engaging for their viewers. Whether they're discussing the latest trends or swapping wild stories from their own lives, the Chroma Chums are always the life of the party on "Neon Sofa Stories."
